I learned """"tact"""" and """"good judgement"""" are leadership traits while I was an active duty Marine. The Marine Corps should remember those traits before they release the report of the results. Better yet-the Marines should look at the training methodology and gear issued to those Marines and make sure those women truly had a fair chance. I'm concerned the Marines will release the results before examining how these tests were conducted. At the end of the day-the service does have to find a way to reflect the society it serves. This reflection is as important and battlefield mission accomplishment.

Her warnings were dismissed as nonfactual & ignored by the governor snyder & his emergency financial manager that he appointed. This was done with no scientific investigation by the gov. only by the fact that since the (one tough nerd as he calls himself) has owned the entire state up to & including the state supreme court under rightwing rule. This governor & his pack of rightwing nazis that have ruled this state for the last 6+ years has done anything they want & almost dared anyone to challenge their rule only to win it in it's crooked court system. Michigan has been ranked dead last in political & court procedure in the entire United States recently & has even gone as far as passing a law to exempt them from the Freedom of Information Act. I'm almost 100% sure that the nerd & his turds just figured this could be handled by the state investigators & handled by the court judges that they own & like all of the other bullshit acts they have pulled will just go away. IMO this young lady is a hero for calling out this corrupt governor & his farout teapublican turds that have ruled this state like it's personal kingdon for as I said the last 6+ years. I hope they all burn in hell for their greedy & unethicle ways.
